description:
Legendary weapons for your Wei officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Xiahou Dun, Dian Wei, Cao Cao, Xu Zhu, Xiahou Yuan, Cao Ren, Cai Wenji, Jia Xu, Guo Jia, and Xun Yu

■How to use
You can change weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Wei Pack 1
